page_content:
Image reprojection
• Observation
– Rather than thinking of this as a 3D reprojection, think 
of it as a 2D image warp from one image to another

Motion models
• What happens when we take two images with a camera and 
try to align them?
• translation?
• rotation?
• scale?
• affine?
• Perspective?

Recall: Projective transformations
• (aka homographies)
